statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-8 \, x^{3} - 7 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x + 17 , x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 2 , 3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 6 , 2 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 5 , 2 \, x^{2} - x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
